content:
I apologize for any inconvenience! Here's a revised list of popular keywords for each month based on South Korean trends and seasonal events. Please keep in mind that this list is general, and it's always best to perform keyword research tailored to your niche and target audience.

January:

1. New Year's resolutions
2. Weight loss
3. Fitness
4. Winter sales
5. Healthy recipes
6. Seollal (Lunar New Year)
7. Organization tips
8. Ski trips
9. Budgeting
10. Goal setting
